entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
